name: Landfall

name: Campaign Complete:  Normal
description: Completed the Campaign on Normal difficulty.
lockedDescription: Finish the Campaign on Normal.

name: Campaign Complete:  Heroic
description: Completed the Campaign on Heroic difficulty.
lockedDescription: Finish the Campaign on Heroic (unlocks achievement for Normal, if not earned).

name: Campaign Complete:  Legendary
description: Completed the Campaign on Legendary difficulty.
lockedDescription: Finish the Campaign on Legendary (unlocks achievements for Normal and Heroic, if not earned).

name: Graduate
description: Graduated from basic training.  Stick with it to earn your Spartan Insignia.
lockedDescription: Earn 5 EXP or finish 10 games to complete the requirements for basic training (Online).

name: UNSC Spartan
description: Promoted to Sergeant.  Proven in combat, you are a Spartan.
lockedDescription: Earn your Sergeant rating to be recognized as a true Spartan (Online).

name: Spartan Officer
description: True veteran of many battles, you are a Spartan Officer.
lockedDescription: Advance to the Spartan Officer ranks (Online).

name: Two for One
description: Scored a Double Kill with a single spartan laser shot in a ranked free for all playlist.
lockedDescription: Score a Double Kill with a single spartan laser shot in a ranked free for all playlist (Online).

name: Too Close to the Sun
description: Destroyed a banshee with the spartan laser or missile pod in a ranked playlist or in campaign.
lockedDescription: Destroy an enemy banshee with the spartan laser or missile pod in a ranked playlist or in campaign.

name: Triple Kill
description: Killed 3 enemies within 4 seconds of one another in a ranked free for all playlist.
lockedDescription: Kill 3 enemies within 4 seconds of one another in a ranked free for all playlist (Online).

name: Overkill
description: Killed 4 enemies within 4 seconds of one another in a ranked free for all playlist.
lockedDescription: Kill 4 enemies within 4 seconds of one another in a ranked free for all playlist (Online).

name: Lee R Wilson Memorial
description: Scored 5 grenade sticks in any ranked free for all playlist.
lockedDescription: Score 5 grenade sticks in any ranked free for all playlist (Online).

name: We’re in for some Chop
description: Destroyed an enemy vehicle with equipment in a ranked playlist or in campaign.
lockedDescription: Destroy an enemy vehicle with equipment in a ranked playlist or in campaign.

name: Killing Frenzy
description: Killed 10 enemies without dying in any ranked free for all playlist.
lockedDescription: Kill 10 enemies without dying in any ranked free for all playlist (Online).

name: Steppin' Razor
description: Scored a Triple Kill with the sword in a ranked free for all playlist.
